feed.title: WatchState Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250121-4144c65
entry.content:
• 4144c65 Merge pull request #585 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • de37955 Build images on PR by ArabCoders
  • 547f338 Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users. by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250121-4144c65

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250121-c50c9be
entry.content:
• c50c9be Merge pull request #584 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 624ebb1 more changes to support multi-user sync by ArabCoders
  • 3caa5dc Clarify the SyncCommand limitation by ArabCoders
  • 2ab88ca Clarify the SyncCommand limitation by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250121-c50c9be

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250122-9fee1ca
entry.content:
• 9fee1ca Merge pull request #587 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • a65f8db updated dependencies by ArabCoders
  • 8da381c Removed NullMapper as it's no longer used, updated both DirectMapper & MemoryMapper to update entities metadata if no metadata exists even if the date is older. by ArabCoders
  • 7d4feb2 Implements progress sync for all users. by ArabCoders
  • fc476d4 remove use old_progress endpoint for plex by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250122-9fee1ca

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250122-b347cc8
entry.content:
• b347cc8 Merge pull request #586 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 266bf1a Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by ArabCoders
  • 6369103 Update reflection container to support manual injecting by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250122-b347cc8

entry.content:
• 8c212c5 Merge pull request #588 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 96ccd88 Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by ArabCoders
